titleStmt.title: The parson's vade mecum containing choice observations about the accounts of the year, ecclesiastical censures, of the primitive fathers and their writings, a catalogue of the arch-bishops, bishops and deans in England and Wales, their election, consecration, instalment, with the clergies tenths, and their valuation in the King's book ...
titleStmt.author: R. M.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
A catalogue of books: p. [1]-[4] at end.
